thread.title: Man proposes to girlfriend by building her a VIDEO GAME
thread.title_full: Man proposes to girlfriend by building her a VIDEO GAME

author: Jeff Parsons
title: Man proposes to girlfriend by building her a VIDEO GAME
text:
Man proposes to girlfriend by building her a VIDEO GAME 20:07, 2 Oct 2015 This is perhaps the most beautifully geeky proposal ever Share Get daily news by email Invalid e-mail 
It's perhaps the most nerve-wracking question you'll ever have to ask a partner - and one enterprising geek found the perfect way . 
He built a video game and asked his unsuspecting girlfriend Lauren to test it for him. 
Each level was inspired by a moment in their relationship. LA Pike The moment of truth 
The self-described "mediocre programmer" goes by the username LA Pike and uploaded screenshots of Lauren's progress to image-sharing site Imgur . 
He also captured her reaction on video, and uploaded it to YouTube . 
Needless to say, she accepted his well-crafted proposal. LA Pike Come on, who wouldn't say yes to this? Poll loading â€¦
